name: AP_CLAIM_IF_MODALTY_SEP
description: This table extracts data received from prospective payment systems (PPS) pricer for a claim in POB3.ESRD 'Children's Modality Factor - Separately Payable'.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim info record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: MODALITY_FACTOR_SEP
columns.description: Identifies separately payable portion of the modality adjustment utilized for the cost outlier calculation. Data received in POB3.ESRD block on incoming message.
